Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Beginning Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField01 6 8 R Enter a beginning date in the form (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField02 6 8 R Enter an ending date in the form (MM/DD/YY)
Enter Starting Security Code or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 8 R
Enter Ending Security Code or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 8 R
Enter Starting Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 6 R Enter a valid customer # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField06 1 6 R Enter a valid customer # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField07 1 7 R Enter the starting order # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Order No. or (ALL) Text PPDField08 1 6 R Enter ending order nunber or (ALL)
Enter Starting Job or (ALL) Text PPDField09 1 8 R Enter a valid job # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Job or (ALL) Text PPDField10 1 8 R ENTER JOB NUMBER OR ALL
Enter Beginning Estimate No. or (ALL) Text PPDField11 1 8 R Enter the Beginning Estimate # to begin printing
Enter Ending Estimate No. or (ALL) Text PPDField12 1 8 R Enter the Ending Estimate # to print
Enter Starting P/O No. or (ALL) Text PPDField13 1 8 R Enter a valid starting P/O # or (ALL)
Enter Ending P/O No. or (ALL) Text PPDField14 1 10 R Enter a valid ending P/O # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Product or (ALL) Text PPDField15 1 15 R ENTER PRODUCT NUMBER
Enter Ending Product or (ALL) Text PPDField16 1 15 R Enter a valid product # or (ALL)
Enter Starting Invoice No. or (ALL) Text PPDField17 1 8 R Enter a Valid Invoice # or (ALL)
Enter Ending Invoice No. or (ALL) Text PPDField18 1 8 R Enter a valid invoice # or (ALL)
